price: ಅಂದು ಆಪ್ತಮಿತ್ರರು ಪರಸ್ಪರ ವೈರಿಗಳಾಗುವರು. ದೇವಭಯವುಳ್ಳವರ ಹೊರತು.
arabic: ٱلۡأَخِلَّآءُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بَعۡضُهُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوٌّ إِلَّا ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Kannada translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kannada language, translated by Muhammad Hamza Battur.

meta.transliteration: al-akhilāu yawma-idhin baʿḍuhum libaʿḍin ʿaduwwun illā al-mutaqīna
